name: Dr. James Smith
units: University of Chemistry and Bioengineering, Chicago
description: Specialist in Biochemistry and Molecular Biology, also teaches advanced courses in Organic Chemistry

name: Prof. Dr. Maria Gonzalez
description: Renowned researcher in Organic Chemistry and leader of various research projects focused on drug development

name: Dr. John Patel
units: Department of Chemistry, Imperial Medical College, London
description: Specializes in Organic Chemistry education, known for innovative teaching methods and research in medicinal chemistry

name: Prof. Dr. Emily Chang
units: Institute of Chemical Biology, Tokyo Tech
description: Conducts advanced research in Organic Chemistry, particularly in the synthesis of novel compounds for pharmaceutical applications

name: Dr. Thomas Wagner
units: Center for Organic Chemistry, Research Institute, Berlin
description: Leads a research group focused on the development of new methodologies in Organic Chemistry and collaborates with industry for drug discovery projects
